pr_title: Hide message re disabling implied dependencies when no dependents exist

timeline.message: Hide message re disabling implied dependencies when no dependents exist

timeline.bodyText: Do you not need to check that p.enabled?
timeline.author: jglick

replies.bodyText:
I thought about it, but didn't for two reasons:

We're currently not live-updating the list when the enabled status of entries is changed. Disable all possible dependents and the message still exists; same with enabling without reload.
I didn't think it was worth it to figure out what happens when you re-enable a disabled plugin. IIRC this can even happen in a running instance when you install a plugin with a dependency on the disabled plugin.

All of this seemed like too much effort for too little gain (not showing this message in few cases).
replies.author: daniel-beck
